```{r}
library("forecast")
library("graphics")
library("TTR")
library("TSA")
library("dplyr")
```
```{r}
library("rio")

df <- import("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bryantddr/mpdw/main/Pertemuan%201/Data/store_sales.csv")
```

```{r}
head(df)
```

```{r}
dfs <- list()

for(i in 1:10) {
  dfs[[i]] <- df[df$store == i,]
}
```

```{r}
dfs[1]
```


```{r}
dfs1.ts <- ts(dfs[[1]]$sales)

summary(dfs1.ts)
```

```{r}
ts.plot(dfs1.ts[1:100], xlab="Time Period ", ylab="Sales", 
        main = "Time Series Plot of Sales")
points(dfs1.ts)
```
